img_text: Reply Reply an Re: Kijang Emas Scholarship Muhammad Shahir Abu Naim <shahirabu@bnm.gov.my> MN 10:21 AM To: bradley tan Hi Bradley, This year we will only be offering the Kijang Scholarship for SPM leavers. I would suggest for you to apply for that instead. Thank you. Regards SHAHIR NAIM I Scholarship Section Strategic Human Capital Department Level 11, Block C Bank Negara Malaysia Jalan Dato' Onn 50480 Kuala Lumpur Email: shahirabu@bnm,gov.my Direct Line: +6(03) 2698 8044 ext 8726
